Title: Requires all school districts to screen all students for dyslexia and dysgraphia
Summary: Requires all school districts to screen all students for dyslexia and dysgraphia; requires school districts to provide notice of such screening to each student and to the parent or guardian of each student; allows parents and guardians to opt out.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring all school districts to screen all students for dyslexia and dysgraphia
